title: Integrated curriculum
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Chris O'Rourke, Lily Steiner and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Shows how an integrated curriculum can operate in classrooms with children ranging from preparatory to years five and six. It shows how different areas of the curriculum can be integrated to promote learning.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, Chris O’Rourke, Lily Steiner and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
